message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $12000. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $15000. This price not only reflects the true worth of the product but also provides you with an excellent opportunity to acquire it at a competitive advantage. I look forward to hearing your response.
